name: Alex Smith
title: Frontend Web Developer
bio: I build accessible, performant, and user-friendly web applications using React, Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio showcasing projects and blog posts. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: E-commerce UI
projects.description: Responsive product listing and checkout flow with focus on accessibility and conversion.

projects.title: Blog Platform
projects.description: Markdown-powered blog with optimized SEO and fast server-side rendering.

projects.title: Task Manager App
projects.description: Real-time collaborative task management application with drag-and-drop functionality.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive weather application with real-time data, forecasts, and location tracking.

projects.title: Music Player
projects.description: Custom music player with playlist management, equalizer, and beautiful UI animations.

projects.title: Design System
projects.description: Comprehensive component library and design system documentation for enterprise applications.

projects.title: Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time analytics dashboard with interactive charts, filters, and data visualization.

projects.title: Social Network
projects.description: Full-stack social media platform with user profiles, messaging, and feed functionality.
